column1: Mass of Christian Burial will be celebrated 12:30 p.m. Wednesday
column3: at St. Elizabeth Ann Seton Church with the Rev. Msgr. William J. King J.C.D. as celebrant. There will be a viewing from 6:00 to 8:00 p.m. Tuesday at Malpezzi Funeral Home
column4: Mechanicsburg. Private burial will be in Gate of Heaven Cemetery.
